title: Agrigrain- The Good Name in Grain

tasks.task: Operate and manage a grain receival site and storage facility.
subtasks: Coordinate with local growers for grain harvesting.
Facilitate grain export by arranging transportation to Port Botany.
Expand storage capacity through facility upgrades.
Establish financial agreements with grain growers (e.g., purchasing, contracts, forward sales).
Maintain community relations and business growth.

tasks.task: Manage operations at AgriGrain's Canebel site.
subtasks: Address the diverse soil types in the area.
Rotate crop types based on soil conditions.
Utilize a Western Australian company's investment for capital expenditure.

tasks.task: Serve as an operational member of AgriGrain.
subtasks: Communicate the business's history and community engagement.
Discuss the current harvest progress and tonnage.
Elaborate on the business's geographical coverage and market opportunities.
